scripts.build-ui: cd my-app && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-server: npm run build-ui && npm run copy-ui-to-server && npm run server-deb-install
scripts.start-server-build: npm run build-server && npm run start-server
scripts.start-server-dev: cd my-app-server  && nodemon server.js && npm run start-app-dev
